# Gnojno, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Gnojno  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Działdowo, within Działdowo County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  south-west of Działdowo and  south of the regional capital Olsztyn.
